DOC.brief_title: Atorvastatin Prevention Postoperative Atrial Fibrillation After Off-Pump Coronary Artery Bypass Grafting Surgery
DOC.detailed_description: Atrial fibrillation cardiac surgery common arrhythmic complication may increase incidence congestive heart failure , renal insufficiency , stroke , increase length hospital stay , rate re-hospitalization , cost care . Its pathogenesis multifactorial , prevention management remain suboptimal . Recently , observational evidence suggest patient undergone previous statin therapy low incidence postoperative atrial fibrillation . The purpose study determine whether pretreatment atorvastatin protect atrial fibrillation follow off-pump coronary artery bypass graft surgery .
